etymology.description: 亼 (mouth) + 皀 (bowl of rice on stand) = depicts someone eating by placing food into the mouth
etymology.interpretation: The character 飠(食) (shí, 'eat') visually represents the act of eating, with a mouth above a bowl of rice on a stand, encapsulating the concept of consuming food.

examples.chinese: 小朋友飠饼干(小朋友飠餅乾)。
妈妈飠饭(媽媽飠飯)，孩子喝汤(孩子喝湯)。
examples.pinyin: māmā shí fàn, háizi hē tāng。
examples.english: Mother eats rice, and the child drinks soup.
